name: move
description: This is the distance, in inches, that the fighter can usually move.

name: weaponskill
description: This shows the fighter’s proficiency with melee weapons.

name: ballisticskill
description: This shows the fighter’s proficiency with ranged weapons.

name: leadership
description: This is a measure of fighter’s ability to issue commands and lead their gang mates.

name: cool
description: A fighter’s Cool represents their capacity for keeping calm under fire.

name: willpower
description: Willpower is a measure of fighter’s mental fortitude and resilience.

name: strength
description: The higher a fighter’s Strength, the more likely they are to inflict damage on an opponent when they are in close combat.

name: toughness
description: The higher a fighter’s Toughness, the less likely they are to be wounded by an attack.

name: wounds
description: A fighter’s Wounds, characteristic is measure of their ability to survive hits which injure them, and keep on fighting.

name: initiative
description: Initiative measures a fighter’s dexterity and reflexes.

name: attacks
description: When a fighter is engaged in close combat, their Attacks characteristic determines how many dice are rolled when they attack in close combat.

name: intelligence
description: Intelligence represent a fighter’s mental acuity and ability to apply knowledge.
